about_the_game:
This artbook was originally put together as a Kickstarter reward - thanks the help of many generous people, we were able to breathe life into the world of NAIRI: Tower of Shirin. Our sincere thanks go out to all of you!

But we don't want new fans to miss out on this experience! This art book is an opportunity to showcase how this world exactly came to be. Many of the numerous art assets in the game went through multiple stages before they were finally finished. We saved a lot of these earlier renditions, collecting a little history of the games development.

From desert cat bandits to mysterious underground labyrinths, with this art book in hand, you are free to enjoy the lovingly created world of NAIRI: Tower of Shirin any time you see fit!
